reviews.review: a lot of russians... so much shit is added now, retarded looking skins, the skins blend with background and its very hard to spot enemy, retarded battlepass, steam only wants ur money, anticheat is so garbage that u can play 3 comptetive matches and only then get banned, they don't make good anticheat becouse they want you to buy prime account, this is absolutely true. Not lieing i have played over 1400 hours from all my account combined so im not lieing about this game. And the game is here to play with friends only and not to enjoy it so this is why I recommend it. Only reason.
